trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around November 15th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was in my house watching tv when i noticed strange light moving outside my window. i went to go see what it was and the objects where making q and e shapes. at first i thought it was a jet or balloon but when it made the q shape i knew it was a ufo. i was scared but i managed to grab my camera and snap 3 pictures.after about 5 minutes the object made a bright flash and then zipped away.
